function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Variation in temperature conditions in the laboratory depending on location","Impact":"Potential discomfort and health effects for individuals in different parts of the laboratory","Mitigation":"Implement balanced ventilation and air distribution systems","Technologies":"HVAC systems with zoning controls","People":"Occupants of the laboratory","Owner":"Facility management"},{"Description":"Intermittent loss of WiFi communication in the laboratory","Impact":"Disruption in data collection and monitoring during critical time points","Mitigation":"Improve WiFi infrastructure and implement backup communication systems","Technologies":"WiFi signal boosters, redundancy in communication networks","People":"Researchers, facility management","Owner":"IT department"},{"Description":"Variation in relative humidity levels within the laboratory","Impact":"Potential discomfort and health effects for individuals due to dry air","Mitigation":"Implement humidification systems to maintain optimal indoor humidity levels","Technologies":"Humidifiers, HVAC systems with humidity control","People":"Occupants of the laboratory","Owner":"Facility management"}]}
